attributes.action: STOP Harrassment by PPI/Accident Claims Companies
attributes.additional_details: We are FED UP with unsolicited telephone calls and texts offering compensation for mis-sold PPI cover and accidents from companies that have purchased lists of private individuals telephone/mobile numbers.  These are happening even when the person has added their number to the Telephone Preference Service which is supposed to stop this type of call.  Something needs to be done to stop this type of harrassment!!!!
